scripts.preview: echo "👁  Previewing fpm binary..." && echo "⚠️  Overwriting your global version of fpm" && rm -rf "~/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/@guscrawford.com/fpm" && yarn run clean && yarn run build && echo "🔄  Replacing your sources & binary.." && cp -r "." "/Users/guscrawford/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/@guscrawford.com/fpm" && echo "🔑  Setting execute permission... 👤 👟" && chmod u+x ~/.config/yarn/global/node_modules/@guscrawford.com/fpm/dist/bin/main.js
